title: Tour de France stage 10: Pello Bilbao strikes for stage win and GC gains to revive Bahrain-Victorious’ race
content:
Bilbao tributes breakaway victory to Gino Mäder, Tadej Pogačar and Jonas Vingegaard finish together in the bunch.

Read the full article at Tour de France stage 10: Pello Bilbao strikes for stage win and GC gains to revive Bahrain-Victorious’ race on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
